# cancel()

**Instance Method**

Cancels the receiver’s download and deletes the downloaded file.

## Declaration

```swift
func cancel()
```

## Discussion

This method deletes the partially downloaded file unless you have previously called [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSURLDownload/deletesFileUponFailure], passing [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
title: cancel()
